alert.note: Alert for Paulding; Putnam (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 01 at 12:30AM EDT until April 01 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DEFIANCE...NORTHERN PUTNAM...EASTERN PAULDING... HENRY AND SOUTHEASTERN FULTON COUNTIES... At 1229 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Liberty Center to near Holgate to 7 miles northwest of Ottoville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Defiance, Napoleon, Ottawa, Paulding, Leipsic, Deshler, Liberty Center, Continental, Holgate, Glandorf, Mcclure, Hamler, Grover Hill, Texas, Dupont, Scott, Melrose, Malinta, Florida and Haviland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
